title: Crime Alert 08.29.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 08.29.19
description:
Man puts heroin in his wife's cereal. Arrest in cold case after construction crew finds murder weapon. Fake cop arrested for using auctioned police car to pull women over.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
